name: Mining Odyssey (itch)
description:
Mining Odyssey is a dynamic platformer game in first person view.

Take your pickaxe and grappling gun and challenge 15 successive timed trials, in which you will have to gather a set list of ores in a hostile environment.

Explore, discover, memorize, die and retry. With each try, get closer to your goal and dive deeper in harder trials.

Triumph of those 15 trials and write your story as a goblin miner.

3 explorable levels

Explore 3 mines packed with traps and riches.


A dynamic platformer

Optimize the use of your grappling gun and rocket boots to be as quick as a true goblin.


Become a master miner

Complete challenges to unlock the gear of the miner masters.
